text: Patrick Brereton is an author and academic at Dublin City University. He studies and teaches film, including a particular focus on the treatment of environmental issues. ==Selected works== *Hollywood Utopia: Ecology in Contemporary American Cinema, Intellect Press (2004) * Continuum Guide to Media Education, Bloomsbury Academic (2005) *Historical Dictionary of Irish Cinema (With Roderick Flynn), The Scarecrow Press (2007) ==References== Category:Irish scholars and academics Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
